tool_description: Google Trends and Search count. Wonder what the world is searching from past to now ( (present time )? Try our simple API Friends....
name: Targeted Keyword trends
title: Targeted Keyword trends

api_list.name: Keyword
api_list.description: This API Returns “Monthly Data” and “Search count” for a given keyword
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://targeted-keyword-trends.p.rapidapi.com/Email Marketing"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "targeted-keyword-trends.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://targeted-keyword-trends.p.rapidapi.com/{keyword}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "targeted-keyword-trends.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
